Posts.Content: scaredmomasgirl wrote: A little while ago I found out my Mom's cancer we have been fighting for the past 4 years, is now considered stage IV and in the bones. I am scared! I lost my Dad when I was 12 from cancer. My mother lives with my 3 children and I. My kids are 11,10 and 6. They are so close to her as am I. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Please Help scaredmomasgirl sandeefeet
